projects.title: Sahayak - Community Support Platform
projects.description: Aims to enhance womenâ€™s safety by offering a platform where users can openly raise concerns and connect with a supportive community.
key_features: Users can create and read posts addressing safety concerns or incidents.
Access to helpline numbers for emergency support.
Includes blogs for awareness and safety tips.
projects.development_stage: Development Stage: Under construction with planned enhancements in user privacy and moderation.

projects.title: University Management System (Web)
projects.description: This system simplifies university record management using React and LocalStorage, with an optional MongoDB integration for database support.
key_features: Manage student details including addition, searching, updating, and deletion.
Local storage ensures persistence even without a backend.
Ensures data integrity through unique identification for each student.

projects.title: Smart Home Automation
projects.description: An IoT-based project that automates various home devices, improving convenience and energy efficiency.
key_features: Allows users to remotely control home devices using a smartphone.
Utilizes Arduino and IoT sensors for real-time monitoring and control.
Implements energy-saving measures through automated power adjustments.

projects.title: TextUtils
projects.description: A versatile text utility app that allows users to perform various text manipulations easily.
key_features: Convert text to uppercase or lowercase, reverse text, and capitalize the first letter.
Provides a clean, interactive UI for better user engagement.
Enhances productivity by offering quick text-editing options.

projects.title: Daily Goals Tracker
projects.description: A simple and efficient Daily Goals Tracker app that allows users to add, complete, and delete tasks seamlessly. Leveraging Local Storage for persistent data, it ensures that users' tasks are saved across sessions.
key_features: Add new tasks to track daily goals easily.
Delete tasks once completed to keep the list organized.
Utilizes Local Storage for persistent task management across sessions.

projects.title: University Management System (Console)
projects.description: A C++-based console application designed to manage university records with minimalistic yet effective functionality.
key_features: Add new students with unique roll numbers for data integrity.
Efficient search functionality with feedback for unmatched records.
Update student details and validate information such as phone numbers.
